title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
One point is earned for the first three terms

One point is earned for the general term

g ′ (x)= 1 3 − 3 5 x 2 + 5 7 x 4 +⋅⋅⋅+ ( −1 ) n ( 2n+1 ) ( 2n+3 ) x 2n +⋅⋅⋅ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@65F9@
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

One point is earned for the first three terms

One point is earned for the general term

g ′ (x)= 1 3 − 3 5 x 2 + 5 7 x 4 +⋅⋅⋅+ ( −1 ) n ( 2n+1 ) ( 2n+3 ) x 2n +⋅⋅⋅ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@65F9@

The student earns one of the following points:

One point is earned for the first three terms

One point is earned for the general term

g ′ (x)= 1 3 − 3 5 x 2 + 5 7 x 4 +⋅⋅⋅+ ( −1 ) n ( 2n+1 ) ( 2n+3 ) x 2n +⋅⋅⋅ MathType@MTEF@5@5@@65F9@

The student earns all of the following points:

One point is earned for the first three terms

One point is earned for the general term
